thread.title: Oldest known cancer cases found in Egyptian mummies

title: Oldest known cancer cases found in Egyptian mummies
text:
Oldest known cancer cases found in Egyptian mummies 10:26am BST - 01:25 
The world's oldest known cases of breast cancer and multiple myeloma have been discovered in the remains of mummies in the pharaonic necropolis of Qubbet el-Hawa in the Egyptian city of Aswan. Jim Drury reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The world's oldest known cases of breast cancer and multiple myeloma have been discovered in the remains of mummies in the pharaonic necropolis of Qubbet el-Hawa in the Egyptian city of Aswan. Jim Drury reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pTansC
